text: MiSynth is a music software plugin startup that is empowering musicians, songwriters, and producers to create music by using the sounds they
text.2: in their heads. MiSynth will make it easier for anyone to start producing music with unique sounds designed from your imagination and generated in seconds with our revolutionary technology. MiSynth is a diving board for your creativity where your imagination is the only limit.

p.2: The ideal candidate will be responsible for developing high-quality applications such as building and testing data acquisition methods. They will also be responsible for designing and implementing testable and scalable code.

li: Work with R&D team to build data acquisition method and infrastructure for software plugin
li.1: Familiar with machine learning, Python and Javascript preferred
li.2: Modifying software to fix errors, adapt it to various hardware brain-computer interfaces (BCIs), improve its performance and upgrade interfaces.
li.3: Directing system testing and validation procedures
li.4: Directing software programming and documentation development
li.5: Designing and developing software systems using scientific analysis and mathematical models to predict and measure outcomes and design conesquences
li.6: Analyze and maintain existing software applications

li: Bachelor's degree or equivalent experience in Computer Science or related field
li.2: SQL database or relational database skills
li.3: Has an interest in music technology and neuroscience
